title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 703.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 703.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall apply to hospitals with
outpatient departments and to independent out-of-hospital health facilities
which accept primary responsibility for health supervision and medical care of
patients. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
703.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
